body: @Merovius I get your point, but doing a random sampling of the packages considered in that count, after looking at 5 of them, none of them are go-get'able, and in the cases that I looked at, the src directory is there because that's where their "workspace" starts. Look at the import statements in the packages: instead of e.g. import "github.com/kpumuk/metricsd/src/metricsd/config" it says import config.
